# AVAudioSession.PromptStyle.normal

**Case**

Your app may use long, verbal prompts.

## Declaration

```swift
case normal
```

## Prompt Styles

- **AVAudioSession.PromptStyle.none**: Your app shouldn’t issue prompts at this time.
- **AVAudioSession.PromptStyle.short**: Your app should issue short, nonverbal prompts.
